action.description: Specifies the action to take if all of the specified conditions are met. The values are not case sensitive. Valid values: `RETRY`, `EXIT`.

onExitCode.description: A glob pattern to match against the decimal representation of the exit code returned for a job.

onReason.description: A glob pattern to match against the reason returned for a job.

onStatusReason.description: A glob pattern to match against the status reason returned for a job.
